body:
1. Is there anyway to search for players on the forums?
2. Is there anyway to view leaderboards with comparison to other players like our old leaderboard system?
body_tagged:
1. Is there anyway to search for players on the forums?
2. Is there anyway to view leaderboards with comparison to other players like our old leaderboard system?
title: Two general questions I have.

replies.body:
1. You can search players for their posts on the forums using the search bar on top
2. Nope, old leaderboards is dead, you can only view each gamemode, not all side by side,
replies.body_tagged:
1. You can search players for their posts on the forums using the search bar on top
2. Nope, old leaderboards is dead, you can only view each gamemode, not all side by side,

replies.body:
Is there any way to search for players on forums?

Personally, I am not certain - however I know that if you "Search" for posts by a certain Author, you can easily click on their profile.


Is there any way to view leaderboards with comparison to other players like our old leaderboard system?

Someone else will have to answer this, I don't really know.
replies.body_tagged:
Is there any way to search for players on forums?

Personally, I am not certain - however I know that if you "Search" for posts by a certain Author, you can easily click on their profile.


Is there any way to view leaderboards with comparison to other players like our old leaderboard system?

Someone else will have to answer this, I don't really know.

replies.body: Do you know why the old leaderboard system was trashed?
replies.body_tagged: Do you know why the old leaderboard system was trashed?

reply_to.body:
1. You can search players for their posts on the forums using the search bar on top
2. Nope, old leaderboards is dead, you can only view each gamemode, not all side by side,

replies.body: Since the Omega update where prestiges were removed :/
replies.body_tagged: Since the Omega update where prestiges were removed :/

reply_to.body: Do you know why the old leaderboard system was trashed?
reply_to.body_tagged: Do you know why the old leaderboard system was trashed?

replies.body:
1. Well if you go to recent discussions you can search for an authors name.

2. The leaderboards can be found here for DTM, and you can see it for other gamemodes if you click the tabs on the left, but they aren't like the old ones.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: I mean, I am a very competitive player and i would like to see how i stack up to the other players.

reply_to.body: Since the Omega update where prestiges were removed :/
reply_to.body_tagged: Since the Omega update where prestiges were removed :/

replies.body: You can do it for one gamemode at a time, click "Games" at the top of the page.
